item.title: Resume
item.description:
EXPERIENCE

UnitedHealth Group (Optum), Greenville, SC

Senior Application Developer, June 2017 - present

  • Creating inner source / open source tooling for API virtualization
  • Modernizing / maintaining legacy applications
  • Coordinating code reviews

UnitedHealth Group (Optum), Greenville, SC

Application Developer, June 2016 - June 2017

  • Participated in Technology Development Program
  • 1st six month rotation:
    • Software developer supporting service virtualization efforts
    • Developed enterprise webapps using Java and JavaScript
  • 2nd six month rotation:
    • Continuous delivery engineer supporting enterprise wide CI/CD
    • Developed automation for XL Release, XL Deploy, AWS using Python, Docker, and Jenkins

Sealed Air Corporation, Charlotte, NC

Information Systems Intern, May 2015 – Aug 2015

  • Represented IS as the main point of contact within a cross-functional team
  • Analyzed software requirements and assessed system capabilities
  • Built mockups to prototype potential new applications
  • Coordinated and led software training for new users
  • Wrote shell scripts to migrate and clean data on system’s servers
  • Developed a cross-platform mobile application

Clemson Computing and Information Technology, Clemson, SC

Intern, Aug 2014 – Dec 2014

  • Developed web and mobile applications to serve Clemson students, faculty, and staff

EDUCATION

Clemson University, Clemson, SC

B.S. Mathematical Sciences (Computer Science Minor), May 2016

Organizations:

  • Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics
  • Wall Street South Investment Club
  • Tigers for Tigers

SKILLS, FRAMEWORKS, & LANGUAGES

Programming

  • Java
  • JavaScript
  • Python

Frameworks

  • Node.js / Express
  • AngularJS
  • React
  • Spring

Development Methodologies

  • DevOps
  • Agile / Scrum
  • Usability Engineering
  • Participatory Design

Scientific Computing

  • Parallel Algorithms
  • Computational Math
  • General Purpose Computation on GPUs
  • OpenCL, OpenGL
  • Matlab

Additional Skills

  • Open Source / Inner Source
  • Web Services / REST APIs
  • Shell Scripting / Bash
  • NoSQL / MongoDB
  • Linux
  • Docker
  • Jenkins
  • Git
